mapper.sql: id, category, channel, version_code, version_name, md5, platform, memo, valid, updater_fk, creator_fk, date_update, date_create
mapper.select:
select id, category, (select `name` from sys_data_dictionary where id = category) category_name , channel,(select memo from sys_data_dictionary where id = channel) channel_name , version_code, version_name, md5, platform, memo, valid, updater_fk, creator_fk, date_update, date_create from sys_version_robot where valid = 1
and ( upper(`version_name`) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{version_name},'%'))
and ( upper(`category`) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{category},'%'))
and ( upper(`channel`) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{channel},'%'))
mapper.insert: insert into sys_version_robot (id, category, channel, version_code, version_name, md5, memo, updater_fk, creator_fk, date_update, date_create) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{category,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{channel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{version_code,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{version_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{md5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updater_fk,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{creator_fk,jdbcType=CHAR}, now(), now())

insert into sys_version_robot
id,
category,
channel,
version_code,
version_name,
md5,
platform,
memo,

creator_fk,

mapper.update:
update sys_version_robot
category = #{category,jdbcType=INTEGER},
channel = #{channel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
version_code = #{version_code,jdbcType=INTEGER},
version_name = #{version_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
md5 = #{md5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
platform = #{platform,jdbcType=TINYINT},
memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
valid = #{valid,jdbcType=TINYINT},
updater_fk = #{updater_fk,jdbcType=CHAR},
creator_fk = #{creator_fk,jdbcType=CHAR},
date_update = #{date_update,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
date_create = #{date_create,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

update sys_version_robot set category = #{category,jdbcType=INTEGER}, channel = #{channel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, version_code = #{version_code,jdbcType=INTEGER}, version_name = #{version_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, md5 = #{md5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, platform = #{platform,jdbcType=TINYINT}, memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, valid = #{valid,jdbcType=TINYINT}, updater_fk = #{updater_fk,jdbcType=CHAR}, creator_fk = #{creator_fk,jdbcType=CHAR}, date_update = #{date_update,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, date_create = #{date_create,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
